name: Alpha Blasters
description:
Basic 2D shooter with two distinct game modes. In Currency War you take control of a Yen ship and try to survive against an onslaught of opposing monetary forces. In Alpha Roids, try to smash the bigger rocks before getting smashed to bits! 

This project was initially released on XBLIG in December of 2010. Decided it was probably worth rebuilding and releasing it on PC.

Mac and Linux builds haven't been tested outside of ensuring that they open, so there might be (and probably are!) issues there.
